name: Advanced Study in Theory and Criticism (formerly INI468H1)
description: Advanced study of select approaches to film theory and criticism. Past seminars include: “Corporeality and the Cinema,” “The Cinematic City: Urban Spaces in Film,” “Sound and Music in Film,”  “Expanded Cinema,” “Digital Cinema,” and "Cinema and Architecture: Scenes, Screens, Studios."
prerequisites: At least ten full-course equivalents, including CIN105Y1, CIN201Y1, CIN301Y1/ permission of instructor
